name: hr-ai-website
description: HR AI Certification Portal - CAHIS Training Platform

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/frontend && npm install --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/backend
scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/frontend & npm run dev --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/backend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/frontend && npm run build --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/frontend && npm run lint --workspace=HR-AI-Portal/backend

author: HR AI Team
